name: Cube Slide Escape - Can You Outsmart the Nine Dots and Boxes?: A fresh puzzle game 2014
name_original: Cube Slide Escape - Can You Outsmart the Nine Dots and Boxes?: A fresh puzzle game 2014
description:
Play the newest quirky cube puzzle adventure FREE for a limited time!

Goofy cubes red, blue, yellow and green all have one goal... to get home to the matching color target. They need your help to do so through 25 mind bending levels of fun!

Use simple 1 tap gameplay to move cubes, break blocks and solve uniquely devised puzzles.

FEATURES

- 25 challenging levels
- Game center leaderboard
- Retro console style graphics
- 1 tap easy to learn gameplay

Having problems or want to leave us some feedback? We would love to hear from you! You can shoot us an email at support@yololabs.com.
